org.webmacro.as
Interface SimpleTypeHandler

All Superinterfaces:
TypeHandler
public interface SimpleTypeHandler
extends TypeHandler

Handler performing conversion of a single parameter value from HTTP request to the value of a Java type.

Example: A simple type handler for primitive type int is defined as: 

 public class PrimitiveTypeInt implements SimpleTypeHandler {
     public Object convert(WebContext context, 
                           String parameterValue) 
     throws ConversionException {
         try {
             return Integer.valueOf(parameterValue);
         } catch(NumberFormatException e) {
             throw new ConversionException("Cannot convert '" + 
                                            parameterValue + 
                                            "' to int", e);
         }
     }
 }

See Also:
CompositeTypeHandler
